question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. green road sign
B. white building
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The green road sign is in the foreground, mounted on a pole near the road, while the white building is in the distant background, clearly farther away.
